reviews.review: Excelente operação. Divertida e vale a pena para todos os fans de CS.
A bit to easy but the opponents may be better in the future. Good for noobs!
ITS A BAD GAME FULL OFF TOXIC ASSHOLES AND CHEATERS
Good game, no hackers, no russians, every little thing is fine with this game
Good times, raw competition, camaraderie, communication, strategy, teamwork and edge of your seat gameplay.  It really never gets old.

Эта игра самая крутая самая лучшая игра во что я играл!!!!

Great game but ....
I don't understand the publisher why the game is free to play, 
It makes the game vulnerable and it's an open call to cheaters.

Like, I shoot some one in his fucking eye with an awp 6 times and deal like 4.5 damage, while someone else steps on my foot and does 89 damage. How does that work? I'm rather disapointed to be honest. And how are you supposed to play the game as a Russian when your team runs to A and shit? Make a dedicated server or just remove A site from all maps please. Also ban 'dog' from this game, guy hacks like crazy. Overall, 9/10
it is the best way to learn russian!

Ótimo jogo, porém dês de quando ele ficou grátis começou a ter muitos hack e eu particularmente odiei isso!!Hoje em dia se vc quiser ter uma jogatina decente é obrigado a comprar o prime para não cair com hack ! Tirando isso é um ótimo jogo!!

Okay, not the first account,  so don't mind about the hours. All right, country where I live - Estonia, and my main language is russian, because my parents are russian. I've learned english very well, but my accent is killing me. I hate when the game goes adequate but a couple second after i say something with very clear accent, my teammates will try to insult me in many different ways. Not all russians are toxic. Believe me. Yes, there is some games when i feel bad about everything, and my skill is going down, but it happens to everyone. Not russians are toxic, the community are. Their behavior is sick. I understand that most of their experience is based on bad situations. But people, not everyone is toxic. I assure you. Please behave nice! I'm asking not only english speaking community, but the slav people too. Take care!
Meh it gets the job done.
